snippet: Sherlock Holmes was a problem solver, but how much was he a creative influence? Plenty, a PBS special asserts.
abstract: Neil Genzlinger reviews PBS television special How Sherlock Changed the World.
lead_paragraph: Sherlock Holmes was a problem solver, but how much was he a creative influence? Plenty, a PBS special asserts.

headline.seo: ‘How Sherlock Changed the World’ on PBS
headline.main: A Study in Forensics, Through a Favorite Sleuth
